package.description: This package is a wrapper on the PQP library available from here. This package does not modify the contents of the original library in any manner and only wraps it for easy distribution with the ROS packaging system. PQP is not under BSD license and is optional for FCL. Users can choose to use PQP by setting flag USE_PQP=1 in FCL.
package.author: Maintained by Jia Pan and Sachin Chitta
